job.title: Software Developer, Digital
job.description: pAs a company whose mission is to be the most progressive and inclusive money transfer business in the world we deliver the highly reliable payment services to our customers With locations in over 402k locations in 165 countries we have adopted the true identity of what it means to be multicultural and embody the idea of being family no matter where we areppbrppAt Ria youre be surrounded by colleagues both in Buena Park CA and across the Globe who are dedicated to each other and empowered to be creative and nurture out of the box solutionsppbrppRia Digitals line is involved in development and maintenance of Ria Digital web and mobile applications They handle the maintenance of extensible microservices for all applications at Ria This branch designs and delivers complex and highly scalable solutions with the best of resources availableppbrppstrongWHAT YOU HAVEnbspstrongpulli45 years of overall full stack software development experience 3 years experience in high transaction volume environmentliliProven NET experience C and expert understanding of ObjectOriented Design and ProgrammingliliHandson experience developing SOAP and RESTful services implementing authorization and authentication proceduresliliDemonstrated strong communication skills across crossfunctional teams peers and executivesliliExperience or exposure to architectdesign enterprise wide applicationslilibrliulpstrongOUR TECHNOLOGIESstrongppHTML5 CSS JavaScript libraries like Angular JQuery IonicVue Net C SQL Server Web Services SOAP and RESTful servicesppbrppstrongWHAT YOU WILL DOstrongpulliApplication analysis design development unit testing and implementation activitiesliliCode across all layers including Front end Web APIs Integration with 3rd Parties SQL scriptsliulpbrppstrongBONUS POINTS FOR THESEstrongppA bachelors degree in Computer Science or closely related field from an accredited university Masters preferred Troubleshooting experience with Elastic Search tools like SplunkGraylogKibana NoSQL Database experience with RedisDynamoMongo and full Stack development with experience on Web and Mobile frontend technologiesppbrppstrongWhy Choose RiastrongppIn this business humility can be hard to come bynbspWe put others ahead of ourselves the way our customers do every daynbspBecause this isnt just business its personalnbspPeople deserve much more than just a fair pricenbspThey deserve empathy hope and ultimately respectnbspppThis how we do right by people and their needs  not more not lessppWe never rest we raise the bar and put people firstppWe work hard and take nothing for grantedppWe facilitate possibilities in every possible wayppWe champion peoples needs today and tomorrowppstrongWe open ways for a better everyday lifestrongp
